text:
Hi everyone,
I have a timeline event in my HubSpot developer app with two parameters `from` and `to`.

Now looks like HubSpot changes something and I cannot update this timeline event because when I click save I receive the error *`Token names must be between 3 and 100 characters.`*  so I suppose the `to`  parameter is not valid anymore.

Do you have some suggestions? Yes I can update the name creating a new token parameter but how is the retrocompatibility?

I am trying to get a CRM card working and I have configured it in HubSpot developer, but it doesnt show up on the deals or contacts.  There also doesn't appear to be any GET request at all to the configured endpoint.  If anyone can help I would greatly appreciate it!
You will need to perform the “install” and have a successful Oauth flow for it to work.

not sure i totally understand, i have built many oauth flows and i do get a code at my redirect which presumably i can exchance for a token, but am i supposed to respond to the redirect with something?  usually the redirect is the end of the chain that lets me get a token, but that seems totally unrelated to showing a basic card
well it works now, a bit of a strange flow indeed, but as soon as i asked for a token it magically showed up :slightly_smiling_face:
